title: Class missing error during build using Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha2

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

I'm trying to build the application with `mvn clean package` after migrating it to Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha2 as per docs here https://quarkus.io/blog/road-to-quarkus-3/ , using the Windows command.

### Expected behavior

Build the application successfully.

### Actual behavior

I'm getting this error:

I'm getting the following error below:
